name: Block (Cleric)
description: Raise your shield Blocking attacks, reducing damage and preventing crowd control effects. Enemies striking you with Elemental attacks take 100% Weapon Damage in return. Increases damage by 15% for 5 seconds for each 150 damage taken while Blocking. Taking more than 150 damage while Blocking activates Shield Bash and increases damage by 15% for 5 seconds for each 150 damage taken while Blocking.
